Compatible with iOS 11, 12 and 13

Fully Working on the iPhone X, since it was thought and written for it.

SmoothLockX Gives you Smooth and Clean Views to the LockScreen on the iPhone X, providing at the moment Features like:

- Move the LockPad of the iPhone X to the Left of the LockScreen for a Less Intrusive Behavior and Sight.

- Hide the the Clock and Date on the LockScreen.

- Hide The Swipe up to unlock of the iPhone X on the LockScreen.

- Hide the Swipe up to open of the iPhone X on the LockScreen.

- Hide the Home Bottom Bar of the iPhone X on the LockScreen.

- Hide the Flashlight Quick Actions Button of the iPhone X on the LockScreen.

- Hide the Camera Quick Actions Button of the iPhone X on the LockScreen.

- Hide the the LockPad of the iPhone X on the Passcode View.

- Hide the % Charged Text while Charging the Device on the LockScreen.

- Hide the Transition of the Text % of Charge when Charging the Device on the LockScreen.

Configure options from Settings.

See Screenshot below.

More Stuff to come!
